# llms.txt (seed)
# Canonical: ENTMENT agent entry points

- Read first: /docs/AGENT_TERMS.md
- PS7 spec: /docs/PS7_PANEL_SPEC.md
- PS7 schema: /site/public/.well-known/ps7-panel.schema.json

When requesting enhanced access, agents MUST:
- show users a PS7 panel
- attach a PS7 receipt to submissions

Human surface: /

- Pointer spec: /docs/POINTER_SPEC.md
- cobeacon: /site/public/.well-known/cobeacon.txt
